title: ‘Not in Any Party’: Athlete Anju George on Reports of Joining BJP
subtitle: Indian athlete Anju Bobby George Viral Photo Fact Check: The claims made in ANI’s tweets are false. Anju George told The Quint that she has not joined BJP and does not belong to any party.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
The speculation started after the former Olympian attended the BJP’s membership drive in Bengaluru.

An archived version of the tweet can be seen here.

Several users on Twitter, too, shared the news.
